comments:

The second traceback was caused by not enough checking on an input parameter.  
Tod has reviewed that change and its been released to HEAD.

This bug is still open to investigate the original traceback.

The first trace and second trace are different problems.  The first trace has 
not been investigated, but the second trace has been fixed.  Since bug 66702 has 
been raised to describe the second part of this bug it will be used to track the 
fix.

There are two tracebacks described by this bug.  The second has already had bug 
66702 created (and resolved) as the main tracking bug for the problem.  The 
first traceback is a duplicate of bug 65276.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 65276 ***
